docs.text:
X-LDSC


X-LDSC (trans-ethnic stratified LD score regression) is a software package
for stratifying squared trans-ethnic genetic correlation from GWAS summary
statistics. The latest version is

version 0.1-beta
.
Baseline-LD-X annotations and LD scores can be downloaded 
here
.


Software requirement




Python 2.7
 (sorry!)


NumPy 1.15+
 


Pandas 0.23.4+


PySnpTools 0.3+


SciPy 1.1.0+


StatsModels 0.9.0+




Contact




Huwenbo Shi
: hshi_AT_hsph.harvard.edu
